chrome.notes: The prefixed property can be used with SVG and HTML with a slightly different syntax, which allows setting the non-standard [`-webkit-mask-attachment`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/-webkit-mask-attachment) property.
While the property is recognized, values applied to it don't have any effect.

edge.notes: The prefixed property can be used with SVG and HTML with a slightly different syntax, which allows setting the non-standard [`-webkit-mask-attachment`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/-webkit-mask-attachment) property.
While the property is recognized, values applied to it don't have any effect.

firefox.notes: Only supports `mask: url(file.svg#mask_id)` or `mask: url(#mask_id)`, where the URL is a reference to an SVG `<mask>` element.

safari.notes: The prefixed property can be used with SVG and HTML with a slightly different syntax, which allows setting the non-standard [`-webkit-mask-attachment`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/-webkit-mask-attachment) property.
While the property is recognized, values applied to it don't have any effect.
